pr_title: Disable Redis integration test by default

timeline.bodyText: This will not work. You need add $MAVEN_FAST_INSTALL to line 109. Other even better, we can break Redis to a separate job.
timeline.author: caithagoras
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@ env:
     - TEST_SPECIFIC_MODULES=presto-hive TEST_FLAGS="-P test-hive-parquet"
     - TEST_SPECIFIC_MODULES=presto-main
     - TEST_SPECIFIC_MODULES=presto-mongodb TEST_FLAGS="-P test-mongo-distributed-queries"
-    - TEST_OTHER_MODULES=!presto-tests,!presto-raptor,!presto-accumulo,!presto-cassandra,!presto-hive,!presto-kudu,!presto-docs,!presto-server,!presto-server-rpm,!presto-main,!presto-mongodb,!presto-spark-package,!presto-spark-launcher,!presto-spark-testing
+    - TEST_OTHER_MODULES=!presto-tests,!presto-raptor,!presto-accumulo,!presto-cassandra,!presto-hive,!presto-kudu,!presto-docs,!presto-server,!presto-server-rpm,!presto-main,!presto-mongodb,!presto-spark-package,!presto-spark-launcher,!presto-spark-testing TEST_FLAGS="-P test-redis-integration-smoke-test"

replies.bodyText: Breaking Redis to a separate job sounds better :)
replies.author: sujay-jain
